name: Reacto
description:
This is Reacto, a game we made for the Ludum Dare 49 challenge with the theme "Unstable". 

You work shifts in a nuclear rector and need to keep the reactor stable, preventing a meltdown. The job is stressful so you need to take medicine to keep your sanity. There are all kinds of tasks that pop up and need your immediate attention. Fix them and save the core from meltdown.

Every new shift will be a little bit harder than the previous. Your score is the number of days you managed to prevented the unstable core from meltdown.

You can play the game here in the browser, or download the stand alone client below. The WebPlayer can be a little bit wonky, and introduces some additional bugs. Use the download for the better experience. A small donation if you liked the game is appreciated. 

with kinds regards,
Magus and Falien
